item.description:
Though not the best venue for a meetup, I wanted to add this one, as I will be there, and it sounds like it's going to be a good show. Tickets are $15

Description from the Regattabar website (http://www.getshowtix.com/regattabar/moreinfo.cgi?id=2286):

Vocalist Anita Coelho returns to the Regattabar with her seven-piece ensemble to perform an enticing choice of classic Brazilian music.

Avid interpreters of gifted Brazilian composers, to include such major figures as Antonio Carlos Jobim, Milton Nascimento, Carlos Lyra and Vincent de Morais, Anita Coelho and her dynamic seven-piece ensemble gracefully incorporate her sultry vocals with the hypnotic rhythms and distinct melodies of the rich music culture of Brazil. Together this musical collaboration create a unique experience taking audiences to where the music, poetry and the warmth of Brazil evoke the meaning of "Passion".

Introducing the extraordinary colors of Katerina Polemi.
item.name: Anita Coelho Brazilian Ensemble
